sloka: यस्यामतं तस्य मतं मतं यस्य न वेद सः ।
padachhed: यस्य अमतं तस्य मतं मतं यस्य न वेद सः ।
anvaya: यस्य अमतं तस्य मतं यस्य मतं सः न वेद ।

en: Whose understanding is (That Brahman is) not knowable, he has known it. He (who) considers (That Brahman) as known, has not known (That).
(Because) People with the pride of knowledge have not known (That Brahman), those without the ego of knowledge know That.
